description: This file is a command-line interface (CLI) script for a universal project initializer, handling argument parsing, project configuration creation, and invoking project setup routines. It provides user prompts, example usage, and integrates with other modules to generate project templates and output status messages.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Data structure containing initialization configuration details for the project templates.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Data class encapsulating the project configuration parameters such as name, version, description, author, type, output path, and additional parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Class providing project type enumeration and a method to parse string identifiers into the corresponding type.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for initializing projects, managing templates, and executing setup routines.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of key=value pairs into a dictionary with appropriate type conversions.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments, integrating parsed parameters.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative filesystem path to an absolute path based on a given base directory.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Serializes a TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary suitable for JSON output, converting init file paths to absolute paths.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Formats and outputs a JSON object summarizing the success status, message, and optional template configuration.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Entry point function that orchestrates command-line argument parsing, project creation, template retrieval, and project initialization, with output reporting.

ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
